description: Generates angle types for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for generate_angle_types
result = generate_angle_types(data)

educational_standards.description: Recognize and describe basic geometric features: edges, vertices, parallel sides, and right angles.
Draw examples of quadrilaterals that do not fit into the subcategories of rhombuses, rectangles, or squares.
Determine if an angle is greater than, equal to, or less than a right angle.
Identify right angles, obtuse angles, acute angles
Identify if a given triangle is scalene, isosceles but not equilateral, or equilateral
Recognize, name, and use the properties of lines, rays, and angles to analyze and solve geometric problems.
Converting fractions of turns to degrees.
